helpText: A noun is a word that represents a person, place, thing, or idea. It is a basic building block of a sentence.
A verb is a word that describes an action or state of being. It signifies an activity or something the family members do together.
An adjective is a word that describes a noun or noun phrase. It adds more information or details to the sentence.
Enter the name of a family member participating in the road trip story.
